actlikeit:ForkInTheRoad.NAME: Choose your Destiny
DESCRIPTIONS: Atop a staircase, you glimpse buildings as far as the eye can see.
The city gives way to a craggy cave speckled with bizarre shapes.
You hear a heartbeat in the darkness that awaits you...
The heartbeat now reverberates all around you.
Something in the distance is calling you...
You find yourself at a crossroad . . .
